Great, cooperative, positive environment.

cons: Group synergy seems to be lacking bit. Coworkers rarely hangout outside of the workplace and school-wide there are rare opportunities to intermingle.

pros: Supportive colleagues who truly want the best for counterparts and students. Many people who are willing to grow and be reflective.
cons:
Administration make choices without input from those involved or even those with expertise. There are so many wasted opportunities because people don't ask or listen to feedback

While many people here are great many of the the upper level administrators do not make decisions in the best interest of the school, students, faculty, staff, or alumni.

pros: Generally, employees have a common goal of striving to provide a positive, professional working environment in which our student receive a high quality education.  Students are very mature so  overall it is a rewarding experience to work with them.
cons: Very specialized work environment, so there is little upward mobility here.  Not known as a high-paying employer, especially for staff positions.
